name: RECHARGE aisbl
goal: RECHARGE (a non profit organization) has been founded to promote the value of advanced rechargeable batteries for a sustainable development and represent the interests of all its members in the chain of battery life.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Batteries Directive, European Batteries Alliances, Circular economy package, REACH, WEEE, ROHS, Product Environment Footprint initiative, EIP Raw Materials initiative, Ecodesign, Ecolabel, Sustainable energy Policy
